**Actuarial Services**
=====================

**Tender Reference:** cb-389-34447312
**Contracting Entity:** Parliamentary Protective Service
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-08
**Tender Closing Date:** Expired (2024-01-11T14:00:00)
**Request for Proposal:** Actuarial Consulting Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

The Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS) seeks the services of an actuarial consultant to estimate the liability value for compensated absences for inclusion in its audited annual financial statements, in accordance with Canadian public sector accounting standards.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful proponent will be responsible for:

* Estimating the liability value for compensated absences
* Providing recommendations for future liability values
* Ensuring compliance with Canadian public sector accounting standards
* Collaborating with PPS stakeholders to ensure accurate and timely reporting

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection of the successful proponent will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The evaluation criteria will include:

* Technical capability and experience
* Proposal methodology and approach
* Pricing and terms and conditions

**Required Skills and Experience:**

* Actuarial consulting experience
* Understanding of Canadian public sector accounting standards
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills

**Submission Guidelines:**

Prospective proponents can download the tender package and supporting documents from the Canada Buys website. The submission deadline has passed; however, submitted proposals will be retained for future consideration.

**Contact Information:**

For further information and inquiries, please contact:
MICHAEL SHELLARD, Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS)
Phone: (613) 295-0667
Email: [proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca)

**Notice Published On:**
The original tender notice was published on the Canada Buys website on 2024-05-08.
